For the chunky tomato salsa: 1 tbsp onion or spring onion, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the filling: ¼ to ½ red, de-seeded chilli (may need to add more) OR ½tsp Tabasco to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the pastry: Follow pastry packet instructions and line out 27cmx3cm or a 30cmx2cm tin and bake blind

steps: Whisk the eggs and yolk, add the rest of the ingredients, except the parmesan and the seasoning.
Add salt and pepper to taste, and pour into the baked pastry in the tin.
Sprinkle with parmesan and bake for 40 minutes, until it feels firm to the touch in the centre.
To make the tomato salsa, mix all the ingredients together and season with the salt, pepper and a pinch of sugar.
Serve with chunky tomato salsa on the side.
title: Crab and coriander tart
